item.description:
Portland ParkSmart is an iPhone app [all about avoiding tickets and getting towed] that's coming out very soon (I hope!). This meetup will talk about the various parts of the app and how they interact with each other.

They include:

- The design and code of the app itself
- Core Location (GPS)
- Core Data (Storing data on iPhone)
- Grand Central Dispatch (Multi threading)
- External Libraries being used
- XCode project organization 

 

- - - - - - - 

 

The above was generously offered by Hasan Adil of LabelTop Software who will be presenting.
item.how_to_find_us: ring the front bell or call (207) 332-2098 if you're locked out
item.name: We'll go through the A-Z of building the Portland ParkSmart iPhone App
